data.lyric:
[ti:Some Girls]
[ar:Jameson Rodgers]
[al:Jameson Rodgers]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Some Girls - Jameson Rodgers
[00:04.18]Lyrics by：Michael Hardy/Jake Mitchell/C.J. Solar
[00:08.36]Composed by：Michael Hardy/Jake Mitchell/C.J. Solar
[00:12.55]Pictures on her phone and tears in her eyes
[00:17.88]Waterproof makeup ain't made for a breakup on a Saturday night
[00:23.61]Then it's hey how you been good how 'bout you
[00:29.00]Funny how seeing you once after a few months
[00:32.15]Gets you locked out
[00:33.63]Right back to telling folks you know I know
[00:37.15]All about some new guy taking you out
[00:40.39]Then you unfollow me then follow me back
[00:43.33]Just so I know you're still around
[00:46.82]Some girls get their mama on the phone
[00:49.26]Take a trip back home pretend they never knew the guy
[00:52.61]Some girls drink a bottle of wine
[00:54.94]Got an old ex to text to get 'em through the getting by
[00:58.18]Sometimes it's a clean break stay gone
[01:01.51]Clean slate moving on to something new
[01:04.35]Sometimes some girls make it easy on you
[01:08.03]But some girls never do
[01:15.16]Some hearts stay broke some hearts don't skip a beat
[01:20.74]Some people say goodbye then try to make it alright
[01:24.37]Just like you're doing to me but tonight I'm letting it ring
[01:29.62]Some girls get their mama on the phone
[01:32.34]Take a trip back home pretend they never knew the guy
[01:35.41]Some girls drink a bottle of wine
[01:37.80]Got an old ex to text to get 'em through the getting by
[01:41.16]Sometimes it's a clean break stay gone
[01:44.28]Clean slate moving on to something new
[01:47.13]Sometimes some girls make it easy on you
[01:51.11]But some girls never do
[01:55.76]No some girls never do
[02:02.46]Yeah some girls know when they've got something
[02:07.27]Worth holding on to but some girls never do
[02:15.57]Some girls get their mama on the phone
[02:17.85]Take a trip back home pretend they never knew the guy
[02:21.05]Some girls drink a bottle of wine
[02:23.54]Got an old ex to text to get 'em through the getting by
[02:26.81]Sometimes it's a clean break stay gone
[02:29.99]Clean slate moving on to something new
[02:32.80]Sometimes some girls make it easy on you
[02:36.72]But some girls never do
[02:42.19]Yeah some girls never do
[02:44.32]Sometimes some girls make it easy on you
[02:48.22]But some girls never do
data.trans:
[ti:Some Girls]
[ar:Jameson Rodgers]
[al:Jameson Rodgers]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.18]//
[00:08.36]//
[00:12.55]她看着手机上的照片 眼含泪水
[00:17.88]防水化妆品也抵挡不住周六晚上的一场分手
[00:23.61]然后就是不痛不痒的寒暄和问候
[00:29.00]有趣的是 几个月后再见你
[00:32.15]已经不再有感觉
[00:33.63]回去告诉朋友们 你知道 我知道
[00:37.15]你和别人在约会了
[00:40.39]你取关了我 后来又重新关注我
[00:43.33]这样我就知道你依然在我的世界里
[00:46.82]有些女孩给她们妈妈打电话
[00:49.26]回家待几天 装作她们根本不认识这个男的
[00:52.61]有些女孩借酒浇愁
[00:54.94]给前男友发短信聊天 以此来度过难捱的时光
[00:58.18]有时候决裂得很干脆 毫不拖泥带水
[01:01.51]就这样放下过去 走向新生活
[01:04.35]有时候 有些女孩会放你一马
[01:08.03]但有些女孩永远不会放过你
[01:15.16]有人心碎一地 无法愈合 有人平平静静 照常生活
[01:20.74]有人说了再见 又满心留恋
[01:24.37]就像你对我做的这些事 但今夜我不会接你的电话
[01:29.62]有些女孩给她们妈妈打电话
[01:32.34]回家待几天 装作她们根本不认识这个男的
[01:35.41]有些女孩借酒浇愁
[01:37.80]给前男友发短信聊天 以此来度过难捱的时光
[01:41.16]有时候决裂得很干脆 毫不拖泥带水
[01:44.28]就这样放下过去 走向新生活
[01:47.13]有时候 有些女孩会放你一马
[01:51.11]但有些女孩永远不会放过你
[01:55.76]有些女孩永远不会放过你
[02:02.46]有些女孩懂得珍惜拥有的东西
[02:07.27]但有些女孩永远不懂
[02:15.57]有些女孩给她们妈妈打电话
[02:17.85]回家待几天 装作她们根本不认识这个男的

[02:36.72]但有些女孩永远不会放过你
